title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Translation (1 point): tears, weeping, crying, sobbing, teardrops; lamentation(s), wailing(s)

Note: Other words are possible but must convey the action of crying, tears.

Identification (1 point): Accusative
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Note: Other words are possible but must convey the action of crying, tears.

Identification (1 point): Accusative

Student response earns one of the available points.

Note: Other words are possible but must convey the action of crying, tears.

Identification (1 point): Accusative

Student response earns two of the available points.
